title: Sr. Specialist, Software Engineer NEW!
full_description: Sr. Specialist, Software EngineerJob Code: SAS20210803-57712Job Location: Colorado Springs, COJob Description:L3Harris is seeking to hire a Senior Software Engineer who will be responsible for developing software applications and lead and/or participate in the entire software development life cycle. This is not a guarantee of compensation or salary, as final offer amount may vary based on factors including but not limited to experience and geographic location.
